void CTA_Modbuild_par_CreateClass ( CTA_ModelClass *  modelcls  ) 

Create the model class of the Par-Modelbuilder and initilizes MPI.

Note:
This is not a user function. It is called at initialization of the COSTA environment.
Parameters:
modelcls O receives handle of the SP-modelbuilder class

void CTA_Modbuild_par_Finalize (  ) 

Stop the model class of the Par-Modelbuilder and finalize MPI.

Note:
This is not a user function. It is called at the finalization of the COSTA environment.
